subject.geographic: United States -- Race relations -- Addresses, essays, lectures.

subject.topic: Taxation and the narrowing of the franchise: "Jim Crow" laws and the poll tax .

mods.note: A pamphlet written in response to a racist editorial in the Memphis Commercial Appeal. The editorial claimed that "negro suffrage was a failure." Rev. J.H. Grant was pastor of Avery Chapel A.M.E. Church in Memphis, TN.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
